title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 348 - Payment Of Disability Retirement Benefits Pursuant To Chapter 710, Laws Of 1989
content:

§ 348.3 - Prospective application of chapter 710, laws of 1989

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 348

Statutory authority: Retirement and Social Security Law, §§11, 90, 311, 390; L. 1989, ch. 710

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
